modName: All my Work in One File - Second Edition
summary:
A few people requested that after I completed my racemenu preset requests v2, that I make a new "All in One v2" file containing all of my work.

This is a collection of most of my RaceMenu and UUNP BodySlide presets I have made since my first "All in One" package was released.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#ff7700][i][b]Join my Discord!!! >> [url=https://discord.gg/YRsPJZc]LINK[/url][/b][/i][/color][/size]

[font=Georgia][color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Includes:[/b] [/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#b6d7a8][size=2][i]RM - RaceMenu. BS - BodySlide.[/i][/size][/color][/font]
